external_games.name: 狂気の宴 ～禁断の誘惑に溺れる夜～（The Feast of Madness - A Night of Drowning in Forbidden Temptation-）

name: The Feast of Madness: A Night of Drowning in Forbidden Temptation
summary: [New Genre of Horror × Erotica: Escape from the Mad Women!]You stop by a mansion to be invited for a free dinner. Once inside, you are taken by magic somewhere dark. If caught, you will be beaten, ××, and forced to submit. Solve the mysteries and escape the mansion.
